thread.title: ‘RHOA’ Matt Jordan Denies Calling Out Kenya Moore for Cocaine Use
thread.title_full: ‘RHOA’ Matt Jordan Denies Calling Out Kenya Moore for Cocaine Use

author: Jessica Bennett
title: ‘RHOA’ Matt Jordan Denies Calling Out Kenya Moore for Cocaine Use
text:
February 13, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Fans of Matt Jordan took notice of a rather cryptic message he recently wrote on Instagram, implying a woman in his life has dabbled in drugs such as cocaine. 
Many followers let it go while others took the subliminal as shade towards his ex, Real Housewives of Atlanta star Kenya Moore. 

The personal trainer captioned a photo of another woman, “I’m staring at you from afar wondering about you… like where you from and who you are. Cuz you a star not the kind that snort them white lines but the kind that light the nighttime. #goal.” 
A photo posted by Matt Jordan (@mattjordanbrand) on Jan 18, 2017 at 3:16pm PST 
When asked point blank if he was referring to the former beauty queen as the one who “snort them white lines,” he immediately denied it, according to RadarOnline . 
“God no! No emphatically no. Just rap lyrics.” 

At least he’s honest about that. Kenya has accused the 29-year-old of lying about his temper and erratic behavior , including damaging her property and speaking distastefully about her fertility issues . 
Matt has also accused the reality star of dating married men for money and orchestrating plot lines on the show to keep herself relevant. 

The chiseled ex shouldn’t be one to talk, however. He recently punched Kenya’s driver and earned two arrest warrants because of it. 
The driver spoke out about the incident, saying, “I was protecting Kenya Moore. The doors were locked, however, my window was down. Security and I were waiting on Peter to get Ms. Moore from the car. Matt drove up, spotted her, came to the car and stuck his head in the window.” 
Credit: Bravo 
He went on, “They’re both screaming and cussing each other when he tried to open the door by sticking his hand in to open the door from the inside, I rolled up the window and he pulled his head out and punched me.” 

Do you think Kenya is really the crazy one, or is Matt the one off of his rocker? Sound off below. 

The Real Housewives of Atlanta Season 9 airs Sundays at 8 p.m. ET on Bravo.
